ModMetadata.Name: IC10 Editor
ModMetadata.Author: aproposmath
ModMetadata.Description:
Custom IC10 editor with more features (and no lag!)
- Undo/Redo functionality (also works on accidential import) - Common keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+? for copy/paste/cut/undo/redo) - Save and close editor with Ctrl+S - Save and close editor + export to IC chip with Ctrl+E - Multiline selection - Syntax highlighting - Errors checking - Tooltips for IC10 instructions and structure hashes - Ctrl+click on a name/hash to open Stationpedia - Switch to native editor - VIM bindings (see in-game help for supported commands) - Register usage indicator - Auto completion - (optional) no line/size limit (use at your own risk, this might change or break with game updates)
[b]Installation[/b] This is a [b]StationeersLaunchPad[/b] Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
Known issues/pitfalls: - The editor always draw on top of other windows (for instance the "Save New" input prompt when creating a new library script). Move or collapse the editor window to access these prompts.
Source Code: https://github.com/aproposmath/StationeersIC10Editor
